format: A data frame with 50 observations on the following 6 variables.

parameters.Y:
Per capita expenditure on public education in a
state, projected for 1975
parameters.X1: Number of residents per thousand residing in urban areas in 1970
parameters.X3: Number of residents per thousand under 18 years of age in 1974

description:
Description
Education Expenditure Data, from Chatterjee and Price (1977,
p.108).  This data set, representing the education expenditure
variables in the 50 US states, providing an interesting example of
heteroscedacity.
title: Education Expenditure Data
